H0.text: Mass describes a cyclist traveling 3 km north in 25 minutes.

H1.text: Force is what the information that a cyclist travels 3 km north in 25 minutes describes.

H2.text: Motion is described by a cyclist traveling 3 km north in 25 minutes.

H3.text: Gravity is described by a cyclist traveling 3 km north in 25 minutes.

A4.text: In physics, motion is when an object changes its position with respect to a reference point in a given time.
